# Problem 12.40 - 3D Mohr's Circle {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A plane stress state results in principal stress σ<sub>1</sub> = 3.2 ksi and τ<sub>max-in-plane</sub> = 1.04 ksi. Use Mohr's Circle to determine σ<sub>2</sub> and the maximum absolute shear stresses.
